EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015 - Your ticket and further information....
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Congratulations, you have secured one of the limited priority admission places at our Ignite event in 2015. Please print off the attached ticket and bring it with you to the event, to gain exclusive access to a range of workshops, stalls and networking events!
Earlier today we also sent an updated email giving you a sneak peak at the range of fantastic partners and professionals who are attending to help you get ahead! We will be announcing all future partners AND all the information on the end of Ignite party on our Twitter page - so get online and follow us on @TCS_SouthLondon.
Competition Time!
Win an Ipad Mini!
We want to give every NCS graduate the opportunity to be involved in Ignite - but we need your help! We need you to get online, into your school, back in touch with your wave and telling everyone about why they should also come down to Ignite!
The person who gets the most NCS graduates to sign up and attend on the day will win an IPad Mini! Winner!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Rhiannon at tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org.
